mapper.update:
UPDATE so_delivery_item
order_code = #{orderCode},
package_no = #{packageNo},
delivery_express_nbr = #{deliveryExpressNbr},
remark = #{remark},
delivery_date = #{deliveryDate},
estimate_receive_date = #{estimateReceiveDate},
delivery_remark = #{deliveryRemark},
deliverier_name = #{deliverierName},
deliverier_mobile = #{deliverierMobile},
platform_id = #{platformId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
